entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:58 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
